author: alkebulan.alliance
title: East African Cardano Community Hubs
description: Eastern Africans are underrepresented in in the Catalyst Community. Bringing Catalyst participants from EA together will have an impact.
solution: Host a meeting in Eastern Town Hall to support Catalyst members from Eastern Africa. The impact of committed people trying to solve problems
experience: Marketing specialist, Community Outreach, Project Management, DevOps, Technical Content Writer & Analyst, Fluent in English, Swahili, French
